text.div:
MeasureReportType

The type of the measure report.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-report-type defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
individual Individual An individual report that provides information on the performance for a given measure with respect to a single subject.
subject-list Subject List A subject list report that includes a listing of subjects that satisfied each population criteria in the measure.
summary Summary A summary report that returns the number of members in each population criteria for the measure.
data-collection Data Collection A data collection report that contains data-of-interest for the measure.

name: MeasureReportType
title: MeasureReportType
description: The type of the measure report.
